Description:
Southie Capital Partners, a U.S.-based Technology Investment Advisory firm, is seeking an experienced Telecom Engineer for part-time consultancy work to advise clients and possibly provide training.
This is not a full time position and the candidate would not need to relocate. This position would only require a minimal amount of time every month or other month.
The client is seeking relevant, up to date industry expertise and this position would be ideal for someone who is currently active in the industry and planning to stay in their current position.
Compensation will depend on experience and relevance of expertise, but well qualified candidates can expect a minimum of $1000 and up to $3000 USD per month with opportunities to earn more.
Highly qualified candidates will be contacted after the vacancy period to set up an interview.
Southie Capital Partners LLC is a financial consulting and limited investment firm that specializes in market research to private clients seeking to invest in the information technology and high tech sectors.Skills
Skills:
Have strong English language communications skills
At least 15 years experience at a major Middle Eastern Telecom company
Be able to travel internationally
Operations and Maintenance experience with Operations Support Systems (OSS)
